title: Jump without jmp near
content:
I need to jump a 

Hello,

I need to jump some lines that lock program in a loop status. i use process hacker to find lines with string in binary but when i find this lines i have not jumps near, in fact i can't find CALL send me to this lines.

this is a part of code:

as you can see error appears in different lines.

comments.text: can you please format the code so it does at least displays correctly? Currently it's hard to read.
You are looking at the wrong place. This is clearly only data , and this disassembly means exactly nothing. You must find the location where that string gets used instead.
i have update a photo of odg32 stacks
